quote: The girl with a future avoids a man with a past.
Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
It's tough to make predictions, especially about the future.
The only thing we know about the future is that it will be different.
We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.
The girl with a future avoids a man with a past.
Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
It's tough to make predictions, especially about the future.
The only thing we know about the future is that it will be different.
We have to do with the past only as we can make it useful to the present and the future.
A generation which ignores history has no past and no future.

A speculator is a man who observes the future, and acts before it occurs.

As one went to Europe to see the living past, so one must visit Southern California to observe the future.

Awareness requires living in the here and now, and not in the elsewhere, the past or the future.
But blind to former as to future fate, what mortal knows his pre-existent state?
Carry on any enterprise as if all future success depended on it.

Children enjoy the present because they have neither a past nor a future.

Create your future from your future not your past.
Demoralize the enemy from within by surprise, terror, sabotage, assassination. This is the war of the future.
Depression is the inability to construct a future.
Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself.
Don't use the past as an excuse to miss out on your future.
Dreams about the future are always filled with gadgets.
Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
Effective managers live in the present but concentrate on the future.
Enjoy present pleasures in such a way as not to injure future ones.

Every thought we think is creating our future.
Evolution never looks to the future.

First and foremost arms are tools in the service of rival nations, pointing at the possibility of a future war.
Future orientation is combined with a notion and expectation of progress, and nothing is impossible.
Future: That period of time in which our affairs prosper, our friends are true and our happiness is assured.

Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

If you see the magic in a fairy tale, you can face the future.

Prediction is very difficult, especially about the future.

The best way to predict the future is to create it.

The enemies of the future are always the very nicest people.

The mind that is anxious about the future is miserable.

The past does not equal the future.
